title: Bagels and Beans - Spui
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chain of lunchrooms, this one is inside Van Stockum bookstore. Offers some vegetarian and vegan bagels, plus sweets, coffee with soymilk option, fresh juices. Uses some fair-trade and organic ingredients. Free Wi-Fi.
venueHours: Mon 11:00am-6:30pm, Tue-Wed 8:30am-6:30pm, Thu 8:30am-9:00pm, Fri 8:30am-6:30pm, Sat 10:00am-6:30pm, Sun 12:00pm-6:30pm
